404.message: We couldn't find the page you are looking for.

FAQ.answer1: As for now, all payments are made with cash money. You can arrange directly with the driver or your passengers for the currency, in CRC (Costa Rican Colones) or in USD (US dollars)
FAQ.answer2: As for now, Tuc치na doesn't provide refunds because you do not pay through the platform. You can contact people directly with the in-App messaging feature.
FAQ.answer3: We collect only information legally required to ensure that our service works properly. We do not share/sell any private information related to your account or your activity.
FAQ.answer4: We are required to keep your ID number and email address for the next 3 months after closing your account. It ensures the safety of the community using Tuc치na. Then these records will be automatically deleted past that time.
FAQ.answer5: Everything is explained in details directly on the page: <1>Experience</1>
FAQ.answer6: It is necessary to complete the ride in order for the driver to receive the money from your booking.
FAQ.question4: What happens when I close my account?
FAQ.question5: How does the experience system works?
FAQ.question6: Why do I need do complete the ride?
FAQ.title: FAQ

becomeDriver.contactHelp: Contact us if you need help with it.
becomeDriver.disclaimer: We do not disclose any information about your country of origin. This is solely for verification purposes
becomeDriver.marchamoExplain1: You can find the year from the sticker usually on your vehicle's windshield.
becomeDriver.marchamoExplain2: To assure the safety of the Tuc치na users on the road, we ask to all the drivers for the year of insurance of their car. It also allows helps protect everyone in case of an accident during a ride. You are likely to get your application refused if your marchamo is not up-to-date.
becomeDriver.message: Build trust with your potential passengers by providing as many authentic proofs of identity.
becomeDriver.notDriver: You can apply to become a driver
becomeDriver.riteveExplain1: You can find the month and the year from the sticker usually on your car's windshield.
becomeDriver.riteveExplain2: To make Tuc치na a safe platform to use, we require all drivers to input the month and year in which a valid car inspection certificate has been issued.
becomeDriver.thankYou: Thank you for applying. A moderator will review your submission

cancellationPolicy.later: Later, the refunds will work according to this:
cancellationPolicy.message: As for now, Tuc치na doesn't provide refunds because you do not pay through the platform. You can contact people directly with the in-App messaging feature.
cancellationPolicy.option1-content: We will refund the amount of your booking except for the booking fee.
cancellationPolicy.option1-title: You cancel your booking more than 24 hours before departure
cancellationPolicy.option2-content: We will refund 50% of the amount of your booking except for the reservation fee.
cancellationPolicy.option2-title: You cancel your booking less than 24 hours before departure
cancellationPolicy.option3-content: We will pay the driver the full amount of your booking.
cancellationPolicy.option3-title: You do not show up on the day of departure
cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy

homepage.catchPhrase: The first ride-sharing app in Costa Rica: an ecological, practical, and economical way to travel and meet people.

howItWorks.bookRide2: For you and all your passengers. The payment is made in cash directly between the driver and the passengers. No commission is applied by Tuc치na for the moment.
howItWorks.both: With Tuc치na, you can do both!
howItWorks.chat: Chat with your driver or passengers
howItWorks.confirm2: To archive the trip, and in the future, allow the driver to receive the money online.

howItWorks.feedback2: To help us improve the platform

howItWorks.getVerified2: Your driving license and car are verified by a moderator
howItWorks.giveDetails: Detail you needs with your driver
howItWorks.giveDetails2: Example: if you transport an animal, a surfboard, or if you don't like the smell of cigarette in the car, etc

howItWorks.points2: Make sure that you know where the pickup and drop off points are. Use the in-app Google Map pin feature
howItWorks.publishRide2: Set your own price. The payment is made in cash directly between the driver and the passengers. No commission is applied by Tuc치na for the moment.
